page.title: 06The Ratby Band
page.content:
{Mrs Watts took us to see the band play on Friday night.At the interval we asked them some questions. There were 28 people playing and there is a junior band which has about 30 people members.The band started in 1906.At present, ten different instruments are played.The biggest and the lowest is the Bb bass or a tuba and the smallest is a soprano cornet.The band practices twice a week-Sunday morning and Thursday evening.They are very popular in Leicestershire and also play in other countries such as:-
Belgium,Holland,France and Germany. Their most embarassing moment was when the base fell off the back of a bandstand in the middle of a performance. {Elizabeth Cannon/Helen Middleton
